Parameter.Label: Remember device status after power failure

Item.Label: Do not remember state
Remember state before power failure

Parameter.Help:
Define how will the Plug react after the power supply is back on.
Default setting: 1
Available settings:
0 - Device does not memorize its state after a power failure. Connected device will be off after the power supply is reconnected.
1 - Device memorizes its state after a power failure. Connected device will be set to the status from before power failure.

Parameter.Label: Reporting 0-10v analog inputs change threshold
Parameter.Help:
Parameter defines a value by which input voltage must change in order to be reported to the main controller.
New value is calculated based on last reported value.
Default setting: 5
1-100 - (0.1-10V).

Parameter.Label: Power load reporting frequency
Parameter.Help:
Parameter defines Time between reports. The report will be sent if last reported value differs from the current value, else reports will also be sent in case of polling.
Default setting: 3 600 (s)
Available settings: 1 - 65534 (s)
Value of 0 - no periodic reports, reports will also be sent in case of polling.
Reports will be sent only in case of power load / energy consumption changes (parameters 40, 42, 43,45) or in case of polling.

Parameter.Label: Reporting Changes in energy consumed by controlled devices
Parameter.Help:
Defines the required change in power to generate an unsolicited power report.
New, reported energy value is calculated based on last reported value.
\ Default setting: 10 (0,1 kWh).
Available settings: 1 - 254 (0,01kWh - 2,54kWh).
Value of 255 - changes in consumed energy will not be reported. Reports will be sent only in case of polling.
